# AVMetadataFaceObject

**Class**

Face information detected by a metadata capture output.

## Declaration

```swift
class AVMetadataFaceObject
```

## Overview

The `AVMetadataFaceObject` class is a concrete subclass of [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVMetadataObject] that defines the features of a single detected face. You can retrieve instances of this class from the output of an [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVCaptureMetadataOutput] object on devices that support face detection.

## Getting the face identifier

- **faceID**: The unique ID for this face metadata object.

## Accessing the face detection data

- **hasRollAngle**: A Boolean value indicating whether there is a valid roll angle associated with the face.
- **rollAngle**: The roll angle of the face specified in degrees.
- **hasYawAngle**: A Boolean value indicating whether there is a valid yaw angle associated with the face.
- **yawAngle**: The yaw angle of the face specified in degrees.

## Constants

- **Face metadata type**: A metadata type string for face detection metadata.

## Inherits From

- AVMetadataObject

## Conforms To

- CVarArg
- CustomDebugStringConvertible
- CustomStringConvertible
- Equatable
- Hashable
- NSCopying
- NSObjectProtocol
